result.title: virtual contests important feature II
result.content: sometimes while solving a virtual contest we solve as much as we can , then we know that , the problems left i can't solve them or i need to finish the practice (the contest) NOW so , we need a " finish now " button to end the virtual contest , not to wait like 1 hour or more if we want to know our final rank what do you think MikeMirzayanov
